title: Microsoft will reportedly judge Xbox division based on Xbox Live numbers
text:
Microsoft will reportedly judge Xbox division based on Xbox Live numbers 
Published By: WPCentral.com - Today 
Microsoft hasn't offered a concrete update on how many Xbox One consoles it has sold for some time. Now a new report claims we may not get t...
